DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate alcohol effect SK3530 pharmacokinetics ( PKs ) safety .
DOC.brief_title: Phase I Study Investigate Alcohol Interaction SK3530
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize , open , single-dose , three-treatment , three-period , three-sequence , crossover study subject receive , random order , SK3530 100mg alone , 0.5g/Kg alcohol alone , SK3530 plus alcohol together . There minimum 7 day washout period treatment . The alcohol dilute 240 mL water . The content drink 1 minute less . For SK3530 metabolite measurement , plasma sample collect pre-scheduled time safety monitor study .
